channel.title: [pi] 317 webclient problem
channel.description:
ill try to explain this best i can
hi i have been making a webclient for my forums.
i have jarred my client and made it client.jar that works, i can play on the jarred client and downloads my cache. i had uploaded it to dropbox / public and i have used a correct html code but the problem im having is when i go to the webclient it asks me if to run java and i click yes then it just goes white and doesnt load then a little error comes up at the top.
any help please this is [pi] 317
ive followed 3 tutorials in creating the webclient and searched for errors and i cant seem to fix this. thanks
i havnt posted a link to the website as it could be viewed as advertising

item.title: [pi] 317 webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

i fixed it thanks tho.

the problem was just me. everybody else could use the webclient but i couldnt. i had jre6 and 7 and jdk 6u23 and jdk 7u2 installed so causing a few probs. uninstalled all the 6 and it worked

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] 317 webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Post your html code here please. I will try to help.

Read full topic
